name: Root Of Win
description:
Root of Win is a 3D puzzle game with lots of interesting mechanics, music and small details that are only visible during gameplay.

Root of Win single player game presents a new type of puzzle where you can follow different paths to reach the end and shed light on the creation of this world.

Multiplayer mode for two players provides even more interesting gameplay, unique levels, mechanics and diverse cooperation with your friend. In co-op, you can play with your friend and communicate in the built-in voice chat.

Game features:

  • 15 singleplayer levels
  • 10 cooperative levels
  • Fully original music
  • A lot of interesting game mechanics
  • Never seen before style of game
  • Multiplayer cooperative for two players
  • Many ways to communicate with friend in the cooperative game
